[http://rugbyleagueproject.com/players/steve_southern.html RLP] }} 'Steve
Southern' (born 29 April 1982 in Wollongong, New South Wales) is an Australian
professional rugby league footballer currently playing for English club
Wakefield Trinity Wildcats of Super League. He previously played in the National
Rugby League for the North Queensland Cowboys and later the Newcastle Knights,
usually at lock and in the second-row.
